dcterms:description: HumanML3D consists of 14616 motions with a total length of 28.59 hours, covering human daily activities, sports, acrobatics, and artistry. It is used to generate diverse and natural 3D human motions from text.
dcterms:title: HumanML3D

dcterms:creator: Catalin Ionescu
Dragos Papava
Vlad Olaru
Cristian Sminchisescu
dcterms:description: Human3.6m is a large-scale dataset for 3D human sensing in natural environments, providing a comprehensive collection of human motion data.
dcterms:title: Human3.6m
